name: COVID_19OrganismOrSubstanceInLabResults
title: COVID_19 (Organism or Substance in Lab Results)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains organisms and or substances relevant for reporting SARS_CoV_2.),(Data Element Scope: Organism and or substance names reported in laboratory results),(Inclusion Criteria: coronavirus 2 organism, antigen),(Exclusion Criteria: antibody)
